name: Labor Day / May Day
description: Labor Day (Święto Pracy), also known as May 1 (1 Maja), is a national public holiday in Poland every year.

name: Day of the Flag
description: Day of the Flag is a observance in Poland

name: Constitution Day
description: Constitution Day is an annual public holiday in Poland on May 3.

name: Whit Sunday
description: Whit Sunday, also known as Pentecost or the Descent of the Holy Spirit (Zeslanie Ducha Swietego) is an annual public holiday in Poland 7 weeks after Easter Sunday.

name: Mother's Day
description: Mother’s Day is celebrated in Poland on May 26 each year.
